GeographicAddressValidation.description: This resource is used to manage address validation request and response

href.description: An URI used to access to the address validation resource

id.description: Unique identifier of the Address Validation

provideAlternative.description: Indicator provided by the requester to specify if alternate addresses must be provided in case of partial or fail result.

status.description: Status of the address validation (inProgress, terminatedWithError, done)

validationDate.description: Date when the address validation is performed

validationResult.description: Result of the address validation (success, partial, fail)
